original: Åhmian, Egon Hjalmar, komminister, Gate, f. 12/12/10 i Vänersb.^ G. 38 m. Greta Helén. Stureby vårdhem v. Sthlm, kommin. i S, Fågelås fr. 38. Ordf. i kyrkoråd, kyrko^stäm-m’a, barnav:nd, insp. f. Hjo komm. mellansk. fr. 41, ordf. i Fågelås hem-hjälpsnd, i S. Fågelås RK-krets, in-kvartrled., omb. f. inform :styr., låns-nykterh :ndns omb., led. av Skara stiftsråd o. ungd:råd, ordf. i Skara stiftskrets av SYPF, distr :chef f. Ska-rab. scoutdistr. av SS. translated: Åhmian, Egon Hjalmar, assistant minister, Gate, b. 12/12/10 in Vänersb. Married in 1938 to Greta Helén. Children: Kerstin b. 1939, Anders b. 1941, Karin b. 1945. — Graduated from Lund University in 1929, theological candidate in 1934 and ordained as a priest in Skara the same year. Assistant pastor in Långared from 1934, Enskede from 1935, catechist, preacher at Gam-melby nursing home and Stureby care home in Stockholm, assistant minister in S, Fågelås from 1938. Chairman of the church council, church meeting, child welfare board, inspector for Hjo municipality from 1941, chairman of the Fågelås home-help association, S. Fågelås RK district, billeting officer, representative of the information board, temperance society representative, member of the Skara diocese council and youth council, chairman of the Skara diocese district of SYPF, district chief for the Skaraborg scout district of SS. Reserves to Germany. Writings: S. Fågelås church, a memorial book (1942), Fågelås, possibly to a seeking historical document (1944).
